Question.Subject: What are some legit Freebie/Sample Sites?
Question.Content: There is nothing I like more than free stuff and samples of stuff. :'D. However, finding it on the internet is way-difficult, because everything looks a bit suspicious. So, if you could, can you give me some sites that are LEGIT that I can get free samples and whatnot of . . . well, pretty much anything?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
These are the sites i use daily
http://www.afreebieempire.com/ (newsletter daily full of freebies) http://www.shop4freebies.com/ http://www.freegrabber.com/ http://www.freestufftimes.com/ http://www.free-stuff-finder.com/ http://www.fatwallet.com/c/33/ http://www.yesall4free.com/ http://www.startsampling.com/samples.iphtml http://www.spoofee.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?forumid=6 http://www.mybargainbuddy.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?s=c13c44da80f6c33434735df2a6636607&f=3

Answer.Content: 1. http://www.bzzagent.com/ 2. lockerz.com <---------------- since its in beta i will give u a invite, email me at tinzovideo@gmail.com
